title: Yes, Trump did call pregnancy an “inconvenience” for employers
text:
09/26/2016 10:42 PM EDT
“[Trump is] someone who has said pregnancy is an inconvenience to employers.”— Hillary Clinton
“I never said that.” — Donald Trump
Trump did make such a claim. In a 2004 interview with NBC’s “Dateline,” Trump said pregnancy is “a wonderful thing for the woman, it’s a wonderful thing for the husband, it's certainly an inconvenience for a business. And whether people want to say that or not, the fact is it is an inconvenience for a person that is running a business.”
quotes: Trump is] someone who has said pregnancy is an inconvenience to employers.
a wonderful thing for the woman, it’s a wonderful thing for the husband, it's certainly an inconvenience for a business.
And whether people want to say that or not, the fact is it is an inconvenience for a person that is running a business.
